casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Larry McLeod PULLEY. No. 42P04-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. Larry McLeod Pulley, Pro Se. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 14th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Lee County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 14th day of December 2006."
